mapper.select:
select t.*, p.pro_name, p.bis_name from trade t, product p
where buy_id = #{id} and t.pro_no=p.pro_no and p.bis_no=(select m.bis_no from member m where m.bis_no=p.bis_no)
where sell_id = #{id} and t.pro_no=p.pro_no and p.bis_no=(select m.bis_no from member m where m.bis_no=p.bis_no)
where t.pro_no=p.pro_no and p.bis_no=(select m.bis_no from member m where m.bis_no=p.bis_no)
order by trd_no desc limit ${startrow}, 10

select p.pro_name, t.trd_money, t.trd_date, t.trd_fee, t.sell_id, m.bis_name from trade t, product p, member m
where t.buy_id = #{id} and t.sell_id = m.id
where t.sell_id = #{id} and t.sell_id = m.id
where t.sell_id = m.id
and t.pro_no = p.pro_no order by trd_no desc limit ${startrow}, 10

select t.trd_code, t.trd_money, t.trd_date, t.delivery, t.buy_id, p.pro_name, p.bis_name from trade t,product p
where buy_id = #{id} and t.pro_no=p.pro_no
where sell_id = #{id} and t.pro_no=p.pro_no
order by trd_no desc limit ${startrow}, 10

select count(*) from trade t, product p, member m
where t.buy_id = #{id} and t.sell_id = m.id
where t.sell_id = #{id} and t.sell_id = m.id
where t.sell_id = m.id
and t.pro_no = p.pro_no
